summary.span: 返回此平面对象的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Returns the string representation of this plane object.

returns.span: 表示此 对象的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的字符串表示形式 使用当前区域性的格式设置约定来设置返回字符串中的数值的格式。The string representation of a object use the formatting conventions of the current culture to format the numeric values in the returned string. 例如， 使用 en-us 区域性的约定来设置其字符串表示形式的对象可能显示为 `{Normal:<1.1, 2.2, 3.3> D:4.4}` 。For example, a object whose string representation is formatted by using the conventions of the en-US culture might appear as `{Normal:<1.1, 2.2, 3.3> D:4.4}`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `plane` 必须已规范化，以便 在调用此方法之前，其向量为单位长度。`plane` must already be normalized so that its vector is of unit length before this method is called.
